import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import rootReducer from"./reducer/index";import thunk from"redux-thunk";// (Optional) Redux Logger
import logger from"redux-logger";const composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;const store=createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk,logger)));export default store;
